definition: dream/CL:場|场[chang2],個|个[ge4]/(bound form) to dream

sentences.english: Newer, medical advancements can assist in helping you get a good night’s sleep.
sentences.chinese: 醫療的新進步可以有助你獲得夜夜酣夢。

sentences.english: The peasants' revolt disturbed the gentry's sweet dreams.
sentences.chinese: 農民在鄉里造反，攪動了紳士們的酣夢。
